Submit the form to deactivate your minin: Popunite formular da biste deaktivirali svoj status kopanja.
You can deactivate your online status at: Možete deaktivirati svoj online status bilo kad.
Submit the form to start mining. Your no: Popunite obrazac da započnete kopanje. Vaš nod mora da bude online ukoliko ne deaktivirate svoj status. U suprotnom kazne mogu biti naplaćene ukoliko ste bili offline duže od 1 čas.
Think up a short story about someone/som: Osmislite kratku priču o nekome/nečemu povezanu sa dve ključne reči ispod prema šablonu
Please qualify the keywords relevance an: Molimo ocenite relevantnost ključnih reči i pošaljite odgovore.
The flips with irrelevant keywords will: Flipovi sa irelevantnim ključnim rečima će biti kažnjeni
Your answers for the validation session: Vaši odgovori za validacionu sesiju su uspešno poslati!
Now solve bunch of flips to check its qu: Sada rešite više flipova da biste proverili njihov kvalitet. Flip je kvalifikovan ako većina, odnosno više od 2/3 učesnika da isti odgovor.
Your current status doesn't allow you to: Vaš trenutni status vam ne dozvoljava da kopate.
Select meaningful story: left or right: Izaberite priču koja ima smisla: leva ili desna
Are both keywords relevant to the flip ?: Da li su obe reči relevantne za flip
Please confirm that you want to use your: Molimo potvrdite da želite da koristite svoju javnu adresu za prijavu na veb-sajt
Idena's network of validated people solv: Idena's network of validated people solves the blockchain oracle problem: Its independent mining nodes can act as oracles. To formalize a unique human, Idena does not require the disclosure of any personal data (no KYC). It proves the humanness and uniqueness of its participants by running an AI-hard Turing test at the same time for everyone around the globe.
Idena is the first proof-of-person block: Idena is the first proof-of-person blockchain where every node belongs to a certain individual and has equal voting power. It is one of the most decentralized blockchains.

to connect to your node

Make sure it is not possible to read the: Make sure it is not possible to read the shuffled images as a meaningful story

To participate in the validation session: To participate in the validation session, you must provide your flips

The number of flips that can be reported
should be limited to 1/3
A good flip earns you rewards in iDNA: A good flip earns you rewards in iDNA
A bad flip penalizes you in iDNA: A bad flip penalizes you in iDNA
A good flip tells a story, assembled chr: A good flip tells a story, assembled chronologically, to represent an event or a process from beginning to end.
A good flip is EASY to solve for humans,: A good flip is EASY to solve for humans, but hard for robots.
A good flip uses clear, simple images, a: A good flip uses clear, simple images, and lets the story be obvious, with no ambiguity.
A good flip uses no text.
A good flip uses simple concepts that AN: A good flip uses simple concepts that ANYONE IN THE WORLD will easily understand, regardless of their native language or culture.
A good flip should be relevant to both o: A good flip should be relevant to both of the seed words.
A good flip makes use of the tools avail: A good flip makes use of the tools available including DRAWING and COLLAGE to help battle against AI and add creativity.
A good flip uses the shuffle to create a: A good flip uses the shuffle to create a 100% non logical alternative.
A bad flip has NO logical story, even if: A bad flip has NO logical story, even if it uses both keywords.
A bad flip contains numbers or letters o: A bad flip contains numbers or letters on images.
A bad flip is hard to understand.
A bad flip contains hateful, inappropria: A bad flip contains hateful, inappropriate or NSFW content.
A bad flip does NOT USE BOTH keywords in: A bad flip does NOT USE BOTH keywords in the story.
A bad flip uses objects in images in seq: A bad flip uses objects in images in sequence (1-2-3-4).
If even one of your submitted flips are: If even one of your submitted flips are reported during validation, you loose 100% of your rewards including invitation rewards for that validation
